__e: I don't care who you are, where you are from or where you are going.
You don't even know where "he" came from. Or what the hell "he" is!
I don't know where this came from or what it means, so don't ask.
If he comes back looking for more, we're gonna grab him, tag him, make the world a safer place.
So, if you can tell me where that comes from and why it is so damn beautiful...
But if you want to find out who she is, where she's from, and what she's doing in that damn house, you're gonna have to pay.
